title: Summary of The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
content: Stephen Covey presents seven habits that can help anyone become more effective in their personal and professional lives. The habits move from self-mastery to interdependence.

title: Summary of The Power of Now
content: Eckhart Tolle encourages readers to live in the present moment. He argues that most human suffering is caused by dwelling on the past or worrying about the future, and the solution is to focus on the now.
